thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 14 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sunworks Appoints Stanley Speer To Board Of Directors

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sunworks Appoints Stanley Speer To Board Of Directors
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Sunworks Inc:
* SUNWORKS APPOINTS STANLEY SPEER, FINANCIAL EXPERT, TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
* SUNWORKS INC - WITH APPOINTMENT OF SPEER, SUNWORKS BOARD IS NOW COMPRISED OF A TOTAL OF FIVE MEMBERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
